biography: Xosé Manuel Olveira 'Pico' was born in 1955 in Muros, A Coruña, Galicia, Spain as Xosé Manuel Oliviera Gallardo. He was an actor, known for Pratos combinados (1995), Mar adentro (2004) and O Apóstolo (2012). He died on June 13, 2013 in Santiago de Compostela, A Coruña.
name: Xosé Manuel Olveira
